author: Brooke Seipel
title: Trump's coronavirus advice to kids: 'You have a duty' to wash your hands, stay home
description: President Trump shared his advice to schoolchildren during the coronavirus pandemic Friday, encouraging them to behave, wash their hands and stay at home.Trump made the comment during a coronavirus task force brief...
